block.p: FARKAS-Mirka. On September 22, 2000. Age 88. Loving wife of the late Leopold. Beloved mother of Peter (Judy) Farkas and Anita (Frank) Steinfeld. Adored grandmother of the late Liza Steinfeld, Sherri (Joel) Maxman, Gene (Kim) Steinfeld, and Michael and Ilene Farkas. Great-grandmother of Lizzy, Sophie, Samuel and Olivia. Services 1:30 PM, Sunday, September 24, 2000, at ''BoulevardRiverside,'' 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, LI.
FARKAS-Mirka. Kind, loving, genteel Mom. Your independence, courage and compassion will be an inspiration forever. We love you. Peter, Judy, Anita, Frank, grandchildren and great-grandchildren
